constraint.description: Each repository should contain an editor config configuration file called '.editorconfig' in its root directory. For more details on '.editorconfig' see http://editorconfig.org/
constraint.cypher:
MATCH (:Maven:Project)-[:CONTAINS]->(config:File)
WHERE config.fileName ends with '/.editorconfig'
RETURN *

constraint.description:
It must exist in the root directory of the project a readme file called 'readme.adoc'.
This file will be displayed on Github while browsing the repositories.
constraint.cypher:
MATCH (:Maven:Project)-[:CONTAINS]->(readme:File)
WHERE readme.fileName ends with '/readme.adoc'
RETURN *

constraint.description: There should be an Asciidoctor document for the release notes of this version.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (rp:RootProject:Maven) WHERE NOT (rp)-[:CONTAINS]->(:Directory)-[:CONTAINS]->(:File{fileName: "/release-notes.adoc"}) RETURN rp.name AS Project
